p: Phytochemical constituents in methanol extracts of Chasmanthera dependens and Chenopodium ambrosioides leaves are presented in Table 3. Methanol Extract of C. dependens leaves contained major classes of secondary metabolites which included saponins, phenolics, steroids, flavonoids, coumarins, terpenoids and alkaloids. While C. ambrosioides contained saponins, tannins, phenolics, steroids, flavonoids, anthocyanins terpenoids and alkaloids.
